AND CTRL_GRP_CD = #{sCtrlGrpCd} -- 통제그룹
AND CTRL_TARG_CD = #{sCtrlTargCd} -- 통제대상 : 필수 AND DLR_CTRL_RANGE_CD = '01' UNION SELECT * FROM SA_0214T A WHERE A.CTRL_YN = 'Y' AND A.CTRL_START_YY_MM_DT <= SYSDATE AND A.CTRL_END_YY_MM_DT >= SYSDATE
AND CTRL_GRP_CD = #{sCtrlGrpCd} -- 통제그룹
AND CTRL_TARG_CD = #{sCtrlTargCd} -- 통제대상 : 필수 AND DLR_CTRL_RANGE_CD = '02' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SA_0215T B WHERE CTRL_DLR_CD = #{sCtrlDlrCd} AND A.CTRL_SEQ = B.CTRL_SEQ ) ) A
